sentences.en: Adhering to the new rules meant inflicting serious damage on motor racing.
sentences.cn: 遵守新的规定就意味着赛车比赛将遭受严重影响。

sentences.en: Damage was confined to a small portion of the castle.
sentences.cn: 城堡仅有一小部分受损。

sentences.en: Environmentalists will be on the watch for damage to wildlife.
sentences.cn: 环境保护主义者将会密切关注对野生动物造成的伤害。

sentences.en: Hallucination is common in patients who have suffered damage to the brain.
sentences.cn: 脑部受损的病人常会产生幻觉。

sentences.en: He estimated the speed of the winds from the degree of damage.
sentences.cn: 他根据破坏的程度估算风速。

sentences.en: His eyesight suffered irreparable damage.
sentences.cn: 他的视力受到了无法修复的损伤。

sentences.en: Incidents of this type cause irreparable damage to relations with the community.
sentences.cn: 这类事件会对与该社群的关系造成不可弥合的伤害。

sentences.en: insects that damage crops
sentences.cn: 破坏庄稼的昆虫

sentences.en: It may cost several billion roubles to make good the damage.
sentences.cn: 也许要花上几十亿卢布才能赔偿这一损失。

sentences.en: It's a fair guess to say that the damage will be extensive.
sentences.cn: 说损失会很严重想必猜得不错。

sentences.en: Most of the damage that's occurred was simply because of fallen trees.
sentences.cn: 目前大部分损坏都是因为倒下的树木造成的。

sentences.en: Persistent damage or inadequate healing may lead to chronic lameness.
sentences.cn: 反复受伤或治疗不当可导致长期跛足。

sentences.en: Smoking can severely damage your health.
sentences.cn: 吸烟会严重损害健康。

sentences.en: The company cannot accept responsibility for loss or damage.
sentences.cn: 公司不承担丢失或损坏的责任。

sentences.en: There is little assessment of the damage to the natural environment.
sentences.cn: 几乎未对自然环境破坏程度作出评估。

sentences.en: There may be permanent brain damage.
sentences.cn: 可能有永久性脑损伤。

sentences.en: These chemicals have been found to cause serious environmental damage.
sentences.cn: 经发现，这些化学物质会造成严重的环境破坏。

sentences.en: These gases would seriously damage the patient's respiratory system.
sentences.cn: 这些毒气会严重损害患者的呼吸系统。

sentences.en: They pleaded guilty to lesser charges of criminal damage.
sentences.cn: 他们承认了刑事毁坏的较轻罪名。

sentences.en: Women sometimes damage their skin by going overboard with abrasive cleansers.
sentences.cn: 女性有时因过度使用磨砂膏而损伤了皮肤。

words.tran_cn: 有破坏性的，损害的；诽谤的
损害（damage的过去式和过去分词）
破坏（damage的现在分词形式）；损害

phrases.tran_cn: 地层损害，油层损害；生产层损坏
有形损坏；物理性损坏；机械损坏

trans.tran_cn: 损坏，伤害，不良影响，损害赔偿金
trans.tran_en: physical harm that is done to something or to a part of someone’s body, so that it is broken or injured
physical harm that is done to something or to a part of someone’s body, so that it is broken or injured
to cause physical harm to something or to part of someone’s body
physical harm that is done to something or to a part of someone’s body, so that it is broken or injured
to cause physical harm to something or to part of someone’s body
physical harm that is done to something or to a part of someone’s body, so that it is broken or injured
